channel.title: Blogs on hi, i'm gianeen!
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on hi, i'm gianeen!

item.title: Expressing Gratitude Using Python and R
item.description: So- you’re graduating in 13 days, you want to express some gratitude to the people you’ve met along the way during your past four years in college, and you have a project due in 5 days and have to demonstrate to your professor that you know the power in using Python and R together. Have no fear! Today I’m going to show you how you can do just that. “But Gianeen, why not just use R or Python exclusively?

Have no fear! Today I’m going to show you how you can do just that. “But Gianeen, why not just use R or Python exclusively?

item.title: Expressing Gratitude Using Python and R
item.description: So- you’re graduating in 13 days, you want to express some gratitude to the people you’ve met along the way during your past four years in college, and you have a project due in 5 days and have to demonstrate to your professor that you know the power in using Python and R together. Have no fear! Today I’m going to show you how you can do just that. “But Gianeen, why not just use R or Python exclusively?
